caption.p: Extracted ion chromatogram (EIC) in positive mode of the m/z 437.34 that is diagnostic ion of MS/MS fragmentation of dehydroursolic acid lactone and its esters. Number compounds from Table 1: 12. Dehydroursolic acid lactone, 19. Acetyl-dehydroursolic acid lactone, 21, 22. p-Coumaroyl-dehydroursolic acid lactone isomers (tereticornate B isomers), 23, 24. Feruloyl-dehydroursolic acid lactone isomers (tereticornate A isomers).
